title: Tesla Model X Performance Pearl White Multi Coat - Prestige Image Motorcars
html: Tesla Model X Performance Pearl White Multi Coat
description: 2019 Tesla Model X Performance Pearl White Multi Coat on All Black  Price : Rp 4 M On The Road Jakarta  KM 17.500 an (on going) Performance Type (Dual Motor All Wheel Drive) Exterior Color : Pearl White Multi Coat Interior Color : All Black 22" Onyx Black Wheels Six Seat Interior  *Open Pre-Order for The 2022 Tesla Model X!* Get yours now!  Tesla Model X Price - Long Range : Rp 3 M (basic price before option) - Plaid : Rp 4.4 M (basic price before option)  Terdapat dua pilihan tipe Tesla Model X yaitu tipe Long Range Plus (Dual Motor All Wheel Drive) & tipe Performance (Dual Motor All Wheel Drive)  Tersedia dalam pilihan warna eksterior : Red Multi Coat, Pearl White Multi Coat, Deep Blue Metallic, Midnight Silver Metallic, & Solid Black  Jarak tempuh : 597 KM (Long Range Plus) & 483 KM (Performance)  0 - 100 km/jam : 4.4 detik (Long Range Plus) & 2.6 detik (Performance with Ludicrous Mode)  Kecepatan puncak : 249 km/jam (Long Range Plus) & 262 km/jam (Performance)  Pilihan velg yang tersedia : 20" Silver Wheels & 22" Onyx Black Wheels  Pilihan warna interior : All Black - Figured Ash Wood Decor Black and White - Dark Ash Wood Decor Cream - Oak Wood Decor All Black - Carbon Fiber Decor (Available for Performance Type Only) Black and White - Carbon Fiber Decor (Available for Performance Type Only)  Pilihan jumlah seats : Five Seats, Six Seats, & Seven Seats  Mobil Bebas Ganjil Genap Jarak tempuh 505 KM Waktu pengecasan 5-6 jam Biaya pengecasan ketika dikonversi ke dalam rupiah Rp 140.000 0 - 100 km/jam : 2.7 detik Kecepatan tertinggi : 250 km/jam Integrated monitor in 17 inch touchscreen Include Autopilot Mode Smart Air Suspension System Free Wall Charger & Installation 2 Tahun Warranty Full Cover kecuali yang habis pakai 8 Tahun Warranty khusus buat baterai mobil
